entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.1°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:08 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
